message:
I'm trying to find a good rich text editor directive for Angular, that supports autocomplete as a tree.

If you have any recommendations or feedback about specific one that you tried, please shoot here or on the StackOverlfow thread.
story: Amr AbuMuslim shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Angular TextEditor with advanced autocomplete
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: I'm trying to find a good rich text editor directive for Angular, that supports autocomplete as a tree, which means: I can pass it for example an array of "suggestions" for autocompletion, and each

data.message: ammm, I don't know what "autocomplete as a tree" means, but I am using Summernote, it's light and bootstrap-based. And of course there's a directive for it for AngularJS (but it doesn't work properly, I created one if you want it).
